name: Downfall Dungeon Deluxe
description:
CONTROLS:

A and D to move

Space to Parry

Downfall dungeon is a fun high score based game where you play as a slime trapped in a dungeon infinitely falling to his doom. In order to stop this, you must jump on different enemies in order to not fall into the depths of the damp dungeon.  Can you survive or will you meet a grizzly fate?
